alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 11:53PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Andrews and Gaines Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1153 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gaines County Airport, or near Seminole, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seminole, Seagraves, Seagraves Airport, Gaines County Airport, Loop, Florey, Paynes Corner, McKenzie Lake and Gaines County Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
